   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(ssl_reject_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_alert.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_handshake.hrl").
   28: 
   29: %% Common test
   30: -export([all/0,
   31:          groups/0,
   32:          init_per_suite/1,
   33:          init_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_suite/1,
   36:          end_per_group/2,
   37:          end_per_testcase/2
   38:         ]).
   39: 
   40: %% Test cases
   41: -export([reject_prev/0,
   42:          reject_prev/1,
   43:          reject_sslv2/0,
   44:          reject_sslv2/1,
   45:          reject_sslv3/0,
   46:          reject_sslv3/1,
   47:          accept_sslv3_record_hello/0,
   48:          accept_sslv3_record_hello/1
   49:         ]).
   50: 
   51: -define(TLS_MAJOR,     (element(1, ?TLS_1_2))).
   52: -define(SSL_3_0_MAJOR, (element(1, ?SSL_3_0))).
   53: -define(SSL_3_0_MINOR, (element(2, ?SSL_3_0))).
   54: -define(TLS_1_0_MINOR, (element(2, ?TLS_1_0))).
   55: -define(TLS_1_1_MINOR, (element(2, ?TLS_1_1))).
   56: -define(TLS_1_2_MINOR, (element(2, ?TLS_1_2))).
   57: -define(TLS_1_3_MINOR, (element(2, ?TLS_1_3))).
   58: -define(SSL_2_0_MAJOR, (element(1, ?SSL_2_0))).
   59: -define(SSL_2_0_MINOR, (element(2, ?SSL_2_0))).
   60: 
   61: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   62: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: 
   65: all() ->
   66:     [
   67:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   68:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   69:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   70:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   71:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'}
   72:     ].
   73: 
   74: groups() ->
   75:     [{'tlsv1.3', [], [reject_prev] ++ all_tls_version_tests()},
   76:      {'tlsv1.2', [],  [reject_prev] ++ all_tls_version_tests()},
   77:      {'tlsv1.1', [],  [reject_prev] ++ all_tls_version_tests()},
   78:      {'tlsv1', [], all_tls_version_tests()},
   79:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], [reject_prev]}
   80:     ].
   81: 
   82: all_tls_version_tests() ->
   83:     [
   84:      reject_sslv2,
   85:      reject_sslv3,
   86:      accept_sslv3_record_hello
   87:     ].
   88: 
   89: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   90:     catch crypto:stop(),
   91:     try crypto:start() of
   92:         ok ->
   93:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   94:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
   95:     catch _:_  ->
   96:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   97:     end.
   98: 
   99: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  100:     ssl:stop(),
  101:     application:stop(crypto),
  102:     application:stop(ssl).
  103: 
  104: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  105:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  106: 
  107: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  108:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  109: 
  110: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  111:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  112:     Config.
  113: 
  114: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  115:     Config.
  116: 
  117: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  118: %% Test cases  -----------------------------------
  119: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  120: 
  121: reject_sslv2() ->
  122:     [{doc,"Test that SSL v2 clients are rejected"}].
  123: 
  124: reject_sslv2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  126: 
  127:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  128: 
  129:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  130:                                               {from, self()},
  131:                                               {options, ServerOpts}]),
  132:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  133: 
  134:     %% SSL-2.0 Hello
  135:     ClientHello = <<128,43,?CLIENT_HELLO, ?SSL_2_0_MAJOR, ?SSL_2_0_MINOR,
  136:                     0,18,0,0,0,16,7,0,192,3,0,128,1,0,128,6,0,64,4,0,
  137:                     128,2,0,128,115,245,33,148,17,175,69,226,204,214,132,216,182,
  138:                     41,238,196>>,
  139: 
  140:     {ok, Socket} = gen_tcp:connect(Hostname, Port, [{active, false}]),
  141: 
  142:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, ClientHello),
  143: 
  144:     %% v2 is considered total garbage
  145:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, unexpected_message),
  146:     client_rejected(Socket, unexpected_message).
  147: 
  148: reject_sslv3() ->
  149:     [{doc,"Test that SSL v3 clients are rejected"}].
  150: 
  151: reject_sslv3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  152:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  153:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  154: 
  155:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  156:                                               {from, self()},
  157:                                               {options, ServerOpts}]),
  158:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  159: 
  160:     %% SSL-3.0 Hello
  161:     ClientHello =
  162:         <<?HANDSHAKE, ?SSL_3_0_MAJOR, ?SSL_3_0_MINOR,0,162, ?CLIENT_HELLO, 0,0,158,
  163:           ?TLS_MAJOR, ?SSL_3_0_MINOR, 97,160,130,59,226,182,64,143,134,112,117,
  164:           64,10,57,164,101,182,215,0,199,145,232,172,194,45,242,48,176,5,153,
  165:           101,54,0,0,26,0,255,192,10,192,20,192,5,192,15,192,9,192,19,192,4,192,
  166:           14,0,57,0,56,0,51,0,50,1,0,0,91,0,0,0,19,0,17,0,0,14,119,119,119,46,101,
  167:           114,108,97,110,103,46,111,114,103,0,10,0,58,0,56,0,14,0,13,0,25,0,28,0,
  168:           11,0,12,0,27,0,24,0,9,0,10,0,26,0,22,0,23,0,8,0,6,0,7,0,20,0,21,0,4,0,5,
  169:           0,18,0,19,0,1,0,2,0,3,0,15,0,16,0,17,0,11,0,2,1,0>>,
  170: 
  171:     {ok, Socket} = gen_tcp:connect(Hostname, Port, [{active, false}]),
  172:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, ClientHello),
  173:     %% v3 is not a supported protocol version (but hello record could have 3.0 for legacy interop)
  174:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, protocol_version),
  175:     client_rejected(Socket, protocol_version).
  176: 
  177: accept_sslv3_record_hello() ->
  178:     [{doc,"Test that ssl v3 record in clients hellos are ignored when higher version are advertised"}].
  179: 
  180: accept_sslv3_record_hello(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  181:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  182:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  183:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  184: 
  185:     Allversions = all_versions(),
  186: 
  187:     AllSigAlgs = ssl:signature_algs(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  188: 
  189:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  190:                                         {from, self()},
  191:                                         {options, [{versions, Allversions}, 
  192:                                                    {signature_algs, AllSigAlgs} | ServerOpts]}]),
  193:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  194: 
  195:     %% TLS-1.X Hello with SSL-3.0 record version
  196:     ClientHello = hello_with_3_0_record(Version),
  197: 
  198:     {ok, Socket} = gen_tcp:connect(Hostname, Port, [{active, false}]),
  199:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, ClientHello),
  200:     TLS_Major = ?TLS_MAJOR,
  201:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 3, 5000) of
  202:         %% Minor needs to be a TLS version that is a version
  203:         %% above SSL-3.0
  204:         {ok, [?HANDSHAKE, TLS_Major, Minor]} when Minor > ?SSL_3_0_MINOR ->
  205:             ok;
  206:         {error, timeout} ->
  207:             ct:fail(ssl3_record_not_accepted)
  208:     end.
  209: 
  210: 
  211: reject_prev() ->
  212:     [{doc,"Test that prev version is rejected, for all version where there"
  213:       "exists possible support a previous version, that is not configured"}].
  214: 
  215: reject_prev(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  216:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  217:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  218: 
  219:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  220:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  221:     PrevVersion = prev_version(Version),
  222: 
  223:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  224: 					      {from, self()},
  225: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  226: 						     no_result, []}},
  227: 					      {options, ServerOpts}]),
  228:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  229: 
  230:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  231: 					      {host, Hostname},
  232: 					      {from, self()},
  233: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  234: 						     no_result, []}},
  235: 					      {options,[{versions, [PrevVersion]} | ClientOpts]}]),
  236:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, protocol_version).
  237: 
  238: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  239: %% Internal functions -----------------------------------
  240: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  241: 
  242: all_versions() ->
  243:     [Version || Version  <- ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1', tlsv1],
  244:                 ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support(Version)].
  245: 
  246: client_rejected(Socket, Alert) ->
  247:     Num = alert_num(Alert),
  248:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 7, 6000) of
  249:         {ok,[?ALERT, _Major, _Minor, _Len1, _Len2, _Level, Num]} ->
  250:             ok;
  251:         Other ->
  252:             ct:fail(Other)
  253:     end.
  254: 
  255: alert_num(unexpected_message) ->
  256:     ?UNEXPECTED_MESSAGE;
  257: alert_num(illegal_parameter) ->
  258:     ?ILLEGAL_PARAMETER;
  259: alert_num(protocol_version) ->
  260:     ?PROTOCOL_VERSION.
  261: 
  262: hello_with_3_0_record('tlsv1') ->
  263:     <<?HANDSHAKE, ?TLS_MAJOR, ?SSL_3_0_MINOR, 0,162, ?CLIENT_HELLO,0,0,158,
  264:       ?TLS_MAJOR, ?TLS_1_0_MINOR, 97,160,130,59,226,182,64,143,134,112,117,
  265:       64,10,57,164,101,182,215,0,199,145,232,172,194,45,242,48,176,5,153,
  266:       101,54,0,0,26,0,255,192,10,192,20,192,5,192,15,192,9,192,19,192,4,192,
  267:       14,0,57,0,56,0,51,0,50,1,0,0,91,0,0,0,19,0,17,0,0,14,119,119,119,46,101,
  268:       114,108,97,110,103,46,111,114,103,0,10,0,58,0,56,0,14,0,13,0,25,0,28,0,
  269:       11,0,12,0,27,0,24,0,9,0,10,0,26,0,22,0,23,0,8,0,6,0,7,0,20,0,21,0,4,0,5,
  270:       0,18,0,19,0,1,0,2,0,3,0,15,0,16,0,17,0,11,0,2,1,0>>;
  271: hello_with_3_0_record('tlsv1.1') ->
  272:     <<?HANDSHAKE, ?TLS_MAJOR, ?SSL_3_0_MINOR, 0,162, ?CLIENT_HELLO, 0,0,158,
  273:       ?TLS_MAJOR, ?TLS_1_1_MINOR, 97,160,130,59,226,182,64,143,134,112,117,
  274:       64,10,57,164,101,182,215,0,199,145,232,172,194,45,242,48,176,5,153,
  275:       101,54,0,0,26,0,255,192,10,192,20,192,5,192,15,192,9,192,19,192,4,192,
  276:       14,0,57,0,56,0,51,0,50,1,0,0,91,0,0,0,19,0,17,0,0,14,119,119,119,46,101,
  277:       114,108,97,110,103,46,111,114,103,0,10,0,58,0,56,0,14,0,13,0,25,0,28,0,
  278:       11,0,12,0,27,0,24,0,9,0,10,0,26,0,22,0,23,0,8,0,6,0,7,0,20,0,21,0,4,0,5,
  279:       0,18,0,19,0,1,0,2,0,3,0,15,0,16,0,17,0,11,0,2,1,0>>;
  280: hello_with_3_0_record('tlsv1.2') ->
  281:     <<?HANDSHAKE, ?TLS_MAJOR, ?SSL_3_0_MINOR, 0,252, ?CLIENT_HELLO, 0,0,248,
  282:       ?TLS_MAJOR, ?TLS_1_2_MINOR, 97,160,7,242,30,221,248,238,18,3,225,13,40,18,16,117,30,
  283:        159,250,156,175,90,184,65,177,226,217,125,205,227,110,154,0,0,88,0,255,
  284:        192,44,192,48,192,173,192,175,192,36,192,40,204,169,204,168,192,43,192,
  285:        47,192,172,192,174,192,46,192,50,192,38,192,42,192,45,192,49,192,35,192,
  286:        39,192,37,192,41,0,159,0,163,0,107,0,106,0,158,0,162,204,170,0,103,0,64,
  287:        192,10,192,20,192,5,192,15,192,9,192,19,192,4,192,14,0,57,0,56,0,51,0,50,
  288:        1,0,0,119,0,0,0,19,0,17,0,0,14,119,119,119,46,101,114,108,97,110,103,46,
  289:        111,114,103,0,13,0,24,0,22,6,3,6,1,5,3,5,1,4,3,4,1,3,3,3,1,2,3,2,1,2,2,0,
  290:        10,0,58,0,56,0,14,0,13,0,25,0,28,0,11,0,12,0,27,0,24,0,9,0,10,0,26,0,22,
  291:        0,23,0,8,0,6,0,7,0,20,0,21,0,4,0,5,0,18,0,19,0,1,0,2,0,3,0,15,0,16,0,17,
  292:        0,11,0,2,1,0>>;
  293: hello_with_3_0_record('tlsv1.3') ->
  294:     <<?HANDSHAKE, ?TLS_MAJOR, ?SSL_3_0_MINOR, 0,219,?CLIENT_HELLO, 0,0,215,
  295:       ?TLS_MAJOR, ?TLS_1_2_MINOR, %% TLS_1.3 has LEGACY version TLS-1.2 here
  296:       97,160,140,70,177,254,168,106,75,198,216,169,71,146,133,144,28,135,
  297:       35,26,222,109,13,169,12,61,229,79,110,238,192,242,32,179,104,86,13,116,
  298:       85,208,242,78,97,216,13,252,63,99,225,0,237,43,221,117,25,238,128,174,
  299:       158,218,232,249,211,93,96,0,12,0,255,19,2,19,1,19,3,19,4,19,5,1,0,0,
  300:       130,0,0,0,19,0,17,0,0,14,119,119,119,46,101,114,108,97,110,103,46,111,
  301:       114,103,0,13,0,34,0,32,6,3,5,3,4,3,8,11,8,10,8,9,8,6,8,5,8,4,8,7,8,8,6,
  302:       1,5,1,4,1,2,3,2,1,0,51,0,38,0,36,0,29,0,32,171,47,137,226,39,16,202,89,
  303:       42,42,32,73,84,134,110,74,110,163,140,111,177,126,133,118,141,2,153,
  304:       156,157,205,101,69,0,10,0,10,0,8,0,29,0,30,0,23,0,24,0,11,0,2,1,0,0,
  305:       ?SUPPORTED_VERSIONS_EXT,0,3,2,?TLS_MAJOR, ?TLS_1_3_MINOR>>.
  306: 
  307: prev_version('tlsv1.3') ->
  308:     'tlsv1.2';
  309: prev_version('tlsv1.2') ->
  310:     'tlsv1.1';
  311: prev_version('tlsv1.1') ->
  312:     'tlsv1';
  313: prev_version('dtlsv1.2') ->
  314:     'dtlsv1'.
